title: Abu Dhabi to offer ECB use of facilities in order to extend English season
description: Sheikh Zayed Stadium could host international games, Vitality Blast or County Championship from October onwards
content:
Eoin Morgan walks out for a net at Zayed Cricket Stadium, Abu Dhabi © Getty Images
Abu Dhabi is set to emerge as a potential venue as attempts are made to salvage some cricket from a ravaged English season. ESPNcricinfo understands Abu Dhabi Cricket (ADC) is… [+2367 chars]
